content.rendered:
This item has a minimum order quantity of 10.

The Clyde Sofa Bed is not your traditional sofa bed! The Clyde simply pulls up with a ladder, side support & storage pouch for a comfortable nights sleep!

Ideal for hotel rooms, lodges and care homes where space is limited. This also enables two adults to sleep apart.

Available in many colours and finishes. 

This item comes with a two year guarantee. 

Height when in Bunk Bed Mode is 1700mm
